solution_line_template: If a third of the cats have spots and a quarter of those are fluffy ({fraction_spotted}) x ({fraction_fluffy_of_spotted}) = {fraction_spotted_and_fluffy} cats are both fluffy and spotted.

Out of {total_cats} cats, {total_cats} cats / {fraction_spotted_and_fluffy.denominator} = <<{total_cats}/{fraction_spotted_and_fluffy.denominator}={spotted_and_fluffy_cats}>>{spotted_and_fluffy_cats} cats are spotted and fluffy.
